caption: The video starts with a bald man and an elderly woman meeting on a high platform, with smoke rising from a city below that appears to have been attacked. The elderly woman seems to be imparting some life philosophies to the bald man. The scene then switches to a military base, where personnel are plotting some sort of military operation. As expected, a team of special forces soldiers is sent to a civilian home with the objective of capturing a child inside. Despite the agility of the child's aunt, she is outnumbered and eventually subdued by the soldiers. The child flees upstairs to hide. At a critical moment, a muscular man bursts into the house through the glass, wearing a bulletproof vest, and engages in combat with the special forces inside. Working together with the aunt, they manage to eliminate all the intruding soldiers and save the young boy and his aunt. For safety, the muscular man takes the boy away to a more secure location.
